Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or 

An open letter to President Sands

Search salaries of employees from Virginia Tech and other universities dating back to  PERIOD

Social media editor

Over the weekend the Hokies took on ACC rival Georgia Tech in Atlanta Georgia PERIOD They got the offense that they had at times been lacking so far this season but dropped two out of three falling to  on the season PERIOD

Connor Coward was once again given the Friday start for the Hokies PERIOD However it wasnt his most memorable outing as he surrendered  runs six of which were earned on  hits in . innings PERIOD When all was said and done it was a  loss for Tech PERIOD

Jack Owens led off the day with a homer PERIOD Joey Bart countered in the bottom half of the frame with a tworun shot PERIOD The Yellow Jackets scored two runs on three hits the following inning as well giving them a  advantage PERIOD

After a single by Nick Owens and a fielders choice Tom Stoffel hit a long ball cutting the Hokies deficit to one run PERIOD

Georgia Tech scored four runs in the bottom of the fourth including a homer from Luke Waddell PERIOD The Hokies countered with four of their own the following inning ending Jackets starter Xzavion Currys day PERIOD

With the score  the home team scored twice in the sixth five times in the seventh and once in the eighth and their lead ballooned to nine runs PERIOD Luke Horanski hit a tworun double in the ninth but Cam Irvine flied out to end the game PERIOD

The bats came along for Virginia Tech in the middle innings on Saturday and despite a late rally from the opposition the team mustered a  victory evening the series PERIOD

Darion Jacoby singled to lead off the third frame PERIOD Stoffel hit a oneout single of his own and then Horanski hit an RBI double to leftcenter giving the Hokies the first lead PERIOD

Georgia Tech tied the game on a sac fly in the bottom of the inning but the Hokies struck back in the fourth PERIOD Four of the first five batters recorded base hits and they scored four runs in the process giving them a  lead PERIOD

A homer from J.D PERIOD Mundy and a sac fly from Jacoby in the fifth frame stretched the advantage to six PERIOD Starter Ian Seymour was driven out of the game in the bottom half as the Yellow Jackets scored one run but the Hokies scored three right back which included a tworun double from Zach Kokoska PERIOD

Joey Bart hit a tworun home run his second of the series in the bottom of seventh cutting their deficit to  PERIOD He then had an RBI double in the ninth PERIOD Georgia Tech scored three more runs that inning all with one out but their final two batters struck out ending the threat PERIOD

Luke Scherzer started the rubber match on Sunday PERIOD Georgia Tech jumped out ahead early and the hole was too much for the Hokies to overcome PERIOD The Yellow Jackets came up with a  win PERIOD

Mundy got Virginia Tech on the board first with a sac fly but Georgia Tech responded in the bottom of the first inning scoring three runs on four hits PERIOD Two home runs the following frame extended the teams lead to  PERIOD

Two runs on four hits in the third made the score  PERIOD Then in the fourth following an Austin Wilhite double Joey Sullivan committed a throwing error on a popup driving another run home PERIOD

Despite the wide margin the Hokies started a comeback campaign PERIOD With two runners on Jack Owens reached on a fielding error and both men on base scored PERIOD The next batter Stoffel was hit by a pitch and Joe Freiday Jr PERIOD hit a long ball suddenly bringing Virginia Tech within four runs  PERIOD

Pitcher Jared Datoc shut down the Hokies the rest of the way dropping them below . and giving them their first losing series since the seasonopening tournament in Myrtle Beach South Carolina PERIOD

Virginia Tech will host Marshall at  p.m PERIOD on Wednesday before traveling to Boston College for a threegame series over the weekend PERIOD
